title: 懸疑驚悚小說｜文學｜外文出版｜誠品線上
raw_text: The Year of the Locust  The Year of the Locust，，  Foe  Foe，，  The Fury  The Fury，，The Silent Patient  Anna O  Anna O，，  I Will Find You  I Will Find You，，  The Housemaid  The Housemaid，，  Verity  Verity，，  Study for Obedience  Study for Obedience，，  Kids Run the Show  Kids Run the Show，，  The Prisoner  The Prisoner，，  The Night House  The Night House，，  The Housemaid's Secret  The Housemaid's Secret，，  West Heart Kill  West Heart Kill，，  Stranger Things: Flight of Icarus  Stranger Things: Flight of Icarus，，  Those People Next Door  Those People Next Door，，  Happiness Falls  Happiness Falls，，  Sign Here  Sign Here，，  Bag of Bones  Bag of Bones，一袋白骨，  Billy Summers  Billy Summers，絕筆，  Fear The Silence: Three can keep a secret... If two of them are dead  Fear The Silence: Three can keep a secret... If two of them are dead，，  Out There Screaming: An Anthology of New Black Horror  Out There Screaming: An Anthology of New Black Horror，，  Central Park West  Central Park West ，，  Fairy Tale  Fairy Tale，，  The Siberia Job  The Siberia Job，，  Central Park West  Central Park West，，  Fairy Tale  Fairy Tale，，  A Bird in Winter  A Bird in Winter，，  Geneva  Geneva，，  Mistletoe Malice  Mistletoe Malice，，  Penance  Penance，，  The House in the Pines  The House in the Pines，，  The Call of Cthulhu: And Other Stories  The Call of Cthulhu: And Other Stories，，  Suspect  Suspect，，  The Perfect Assassin  The Perfect Assassin，，  The Surgeon  The Surgeon，，  Camp Damascus  Camp Damascus，，  Gone Tonight  Gone Tonight，，  A Flicker in the Dark  A Flicker in the Dark，暗夜爍光，  Reckless Girls  Reckless Girls，，  The Nothing Man  The Nothing Man，，

source-hostname: 懸疑驚悚小說｜文學｜外文出版｜誠品線上
excerpt: 懸疑驚悚小說類-提供各種懸疑驚悚小說新品及優惠商品。誠品以「人文、藝術、創意、生活」為核心價值，由推廣閱讀出發，並透過線上網路，傳遞博雅的溫度，打造全新的文化場域。
